sentences.en: An actuary is a business professional who analyzes the financial consequences of risk.
sentences.cn: 精算师是现代职业的一种,工作是分析风险的财务结果.

sentences.en: An actuary provides a forecast in the quantity of sufficient reserves an insurance company should possess.
sentences.cn: 精算师为保险公司拥有足够的储备金提供了量的预测.

sentences.en: French actuary and close associate of artist Pablo Picasso.
sentences.cn: 法国精算师,帕博罗毕加索的密友.

sentences.en: I have been an actuary with Nanchang people's Insurance Agency for nearly four years.
sentences.cn: 我在南昌人民保险公司当保险统计员已近4年.

sentences.en: It is hard to get an Actuary Certificate.
sentences.cn: 获取精算师执照是很难的.

sentences.en: Morgan was the appointed Actuary of the Society for Equitable Assurances in 1775.
sentences.cn: 摩根在1775年被指认为公正保险精算学会的成员.

sentences.en: Nowadays, I'm working hard to become an actuary.
sentences.cn: 现在我正努力成为一名精算师.

sentences.en: Using insurance actuary pricing , we gain the European option pricing model.
sentences.cn: 使用保险精算法,给出了欧式期权的定价公式.

words.tran_cn: [保险] 保险精算的；[保险] 保险统计的

trans.tran_cn: 保险精算师，保险（业务）计算员
trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to advise insurance companies on how much to charge for insurance, after calculating the risks
